1:
--------------------
Text: RAF Mount Pleasant:  The airfield goes by the motto of "Defend the right" (while the motto of the islands is "Desire the right") and is part of the British Forces South Atlantic Islands (BFSAI).
Triplets:<RAF Mount Pleasant
2:
--------------------
Text: RAF Mount Pleasant:  Home to between 1,000 and 2,000 British military personnel, it is located about 33 mi southwest of Stanley, the capital of the Falklands—on the island of East Falkland.
